com.swirlds.platform

Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swirlds.platform.Utilities

  • public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a collection of static utility methods, such as for comparing and deep cloning of arrays.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Utilities()

    • Method Detail

      • deepClone

        public static long[][] deepClone(long[][] original)
        Do a deep clone of a 2D array. Here, "deep" means that after doing x=deepClone(y), x won't be affected by changes to any part of y, such as assigning to y or to y[0] or to y[0][0].
        Parameters:
        original - the original array
        Returns:
        the deep clone

      • deepClone

        public static byte[][] deepClone(byte[][] original)
        Do a deep clone of a 2D array. Here, "deep" means that after doing x=deepClone(y), x won't be affected by changes to any part of y, such as assigning to y or to y[0] or to y[0][0].
        Parameters:
        original - the original array
        Returns:
        the deep clone

      • deepCloneBySerializing

        public static java.lang.Object deepCloneBySerializing(java.lang.Object original)
        Do a deep clone of any serialiazable object that can reach only other serializable objects through following references.
        Parameters:
        original - the object to clone
        Returns:
        the clone

      • toBytes

        public static byte[] toBytes(long n)
        Convert the given long to bytes, big endian.
        Parameters:
        n - the long to convert
        Returns:
        a big-endian representation of n as an array of Long.BYTES bytes

      • toBytes

        public static void toBytes(long n,
                           byte[] bytes,
                           int start)
        Convert the given long to bytes, big endian, and put them into the array, starting at index start
        Parameters:
        bytes - the array to hold the Long.BYTES bytes of result
        n - the long to convert to bytes
        start - the bytes are written to Long.BYTES elements of the array, starting with this index

      • toLong

        public static long toLong(byte[] b)
        convert the given byte array to a long
        Parameters:
        b - the byte array to convert (at least 8 bytes)
        Returns:
        the long that was represented by the array

      • toLong

        public static long toLong(byte[] b,
                          int start)
        convert part of the given byte array to a long, starting with index start
        Parameters:
        b - the byte array to convert
        start - the index of the first byte (most significant byte) of the 8 bytes to convert
        Returns:
        the long
